name: metrixlabs
overview:
Over the past 10 years, MetrixLab has grown to be one of the 10 largest online market research specialists in the world. With offices in Rotterdam, New York, London, Paris, Hamburg and Madrid, MetrixLab conducts online research in more than 44 countries worldwide and works with 52 of the top 100 global brands, such as Microsoft, Philips, Unilever, Google, Siemens and PepsiCo.

MetrixLab is their major provider of online and cross-media campaign tracking; advertising pre-testing; online concept, prototype and packaging testing; consumer communities; website user testing and customer satisfaction research.

Our strategic goal is to be recognized as the “online research thought leader” in delivering high-quality information and profound consumer insights that help our clients improve marketing ROI.

milestones.description: MetrixLab Acquires Strategic Ownership Position in Precision Sample
milestones.source_description: MetrixLab Acquires Strategic Ownership Position in Precision Sample
